post: I’m impressed! This 14 year old has been reading this blog for the last two years! Talk about “Out of the mouths of babes”! My answer: It is not just one thing, but the collective weight of present evidence that persuades me that the Shroud is the authentic burial cloth of Jesus of Nazareth, even though there remain many gaps yet to be filled..
title: What one single characteristic about the shroud  . . . ?
